CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: --local userData = _DataStorageService:GetUserDataStorage(self.Entity.PlayerComponent.UserId) --local callBack = function(e,k,v) --if v == nil then v = 0 end --if k == "IronPlate" then --self.ironPlateNum = tonumber(v) end --end --userData:GetAsync("IronPlate", callBack)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SaveIronPlate
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local userData = _DataStorageService:GetUserDataStorage(self.Entity.PlayerComponent.UserId) local callBack = function(e,k) log(k.." 값이 저장되었습니다.") end userData:SetAsync("IronPlate", tostring(self.ironPlateNum), callBack)
